title.title: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.text: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.html: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR

tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HOURS RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HOURS RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HOURS RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to try the challenge white water rafting tours at ayung river in north of Ubud Bali and continue visiting the sea temple or Tanah Lot Temple and visit other tourist destinations. Ayung River is the longest and largest river in Bali and along this river white water rafting was introduce in Bali, To experience raftng on ayung west side is amazing, for besides the enjoyment of challenging rapids, the panorama of this beautiful intact nature area is highlighted by the appereance of wild animals along the rafting route such as big bats, black monkeys and more. Other places of interest will visit is Taman Ayun Temple is a temple located in mengwi regency and the main temple for mengwi kingdom surrounded by the wide moat. Then the last site feautured in the Ayung Rafting and tanah Lot Tour is to visit Tanah Lot Temple is located at Tabanan Regency and spectacular tanah lot posibly the best known and most photografer temple in Bali islands with beautiful sunset view. The Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour will be very enjoyable with our friendly Bali Day Tours Driver will make the trip memorable one. Below is short decription places of onterest will be visit during Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour.

title.title: Ayung River Rafting Adventure | Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Ayung River Rafting | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of the best Bali Rafting tour in northern part of Ubud with the beautiful and high riverbank. Ripples irrigate the river rock, tracing Bali nature pass the river which is full of fun and pass the attractive and challenging rapids are the impressive Ayung Rafting experience on your vacation in Bali. Your Bali Rafting Tour adventure in the water will end at the finish point and enjoy the buffet lunch at the same time enjoy the nature of Ubud Bali. Taking shower and change clothes will be reserved to refresh your body. The comfortable transportation which have been provided will bring the you return to hotel with fully memory. Enjoy the White Water Rafting Adventure at Ayung River is correct choice for the adventure in river water.

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple Is located in Mengwi District and about 45 minutes from Denpasar Town. This temple is designed with Bali architecture, the form this temple building is also owns separate unique with up to 10 storeys . Taman Ayun Temple is built on the flat land with big fish pond surround it and it is looked like adrift on the water. Taman Ayun Temple is also considered to have historical values, which makes the regional government of Bali suggests the UNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in World Heritage List.
description.html: Taman Ayun Temple Is located in Mengwi District and about 45 minutes from Denpasar Town. title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple Is a Balinese Hindu temple on the rock located in the middle of sea. Tanah lot temple is very beautiful in the particular of the sunset time. We can view this temple from several spot points with spectacular view of the ocean and sunset. We will find the tanah lot temple a drift on the seawater when the water is going tide because this temple will be surrounded by the seawater. The word of Tanah Lot is consisted of two words that are Tanah word interpreted as a reef looking like gili or island. Lot or Lod word has meaning the sea. So Tanah Lot is meaning the small island floating on the sea. The location is now called as Tanah Lot has been used at a Megalithic periode.
description.html: Tanah Lot Temple Is a Balinese Hindu temple on the rock located in the middle of sea. Tanah lot temple is very beautiful in the particular of the sunset time. We can view this temple from several spot points with spectacular view of the ocean and sunset. The word of Tanah Lot is consisted of two words that are Tanah word interpreted as a reef looking like gili or island. Lot or Lod word has meaning the sea. So Tanah Lot is meaning the small island floating on the sea. The location is now called as Tanah Lot has been used at a Megalithic periode.

price.title: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 950,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 700,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 600,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 550,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 500,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour Price Include :

  • Private A/C Car
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Ayung Rafting Adventure in Ubud
  • Lunch Buffet Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket at Tourism Site
  • Insurance Coverage during Ayung Rafting
  • Using facilities locker, shower and towel
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Rafting and Tanah Lot Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Start for Ayung Bali Rafting Adventure
Rafting finish and join the lunch
Visit Taman Ayun Temple
Visit Tanah Lot Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
